QuestData.Title: The Bear God's Offspring
QuestData.Description: It is possible that the furbolg of Grizzly Hills have the same taint that plagued Vordrassil. They've been involved in a deadly tribal war recently after years of peaceful coexistence.$B$BThe shrines that they guard to the east are home to Ursoc's offspring.$B$BIf the corruption has affected the furbolg, it is possible that because of their lineage, Kodian and Orsonn have remained unharmed.$B$BIf that's the case, find them and listen to what they have to say.
QuestData.LogDescription: Windseer Grayhorn in Conquest Hold wants you to speak to Orsonn at the Ragefang Shrine and Kodian at the Heart's Blood Shrine.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you spoken to Ursoc's children yet, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Ursoc's children are wise. Their words explain much of what we've seen so far.
